ogc.ogc-utils.prov.description: Provenance Chain using PROV-O core model supporting both an ID based object graph and nesting

Prov.description: An list of provenance objects linked together to form a provenance chain for the current object. Objects may have nested objects as well, with or without referencable ids

github.com_radiantearth_stac-spec_raw_ma.title: STAC Item
github.com_radiantearth_stac-spec_raw_ma.description: This object represents the metadata for an item in a SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog.

collection.title: Collection ID
collection.description: The ID of the STAC Collection this Item references to.

schemas.stacspec.org_v1.0.0_item-spec_js.title: STAC Item
schemas.stacspec.org_v1.0.0_item-spec_js.description: This object represents the metadata for an item in a SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog.

collection.title: Collection ID
collection.description: The ID of the STAC Collection this Item references to.

title.title: Item Title
title.description: A human-readable title describing the Item.

description.title: Item Description
description.description: Detailed multi-line description to fully explain the Item.

datetime.title: Date and Time
datetime.description: The searchable date/time of the assets, in UTC (Formatted in RFC 3339)

start_datetime.title: Start Date and Time
start_datetime.description: The searchable start date/time of the assets, in UTC (Formatted in RFC 3339)

end_datetime.title: End Date and Time
end_datetime.description: The searchable end date/time of the assets, in UTC (Formatted in RFC 3339)
